tips.tip: Crop rotation involves the sequential growing of different crops on the same site. This practice benefits soil health and fertility. The given method is used to reduce or prevent diseases and the spread of pests.

Intercropping or mixed cropping is the practice of growing various types of crops on the same plot simultaneously. The essence of this method lies in the fact that, with biological interaction, plants can benefit each other.

Zoning involves drawing up control schemes for which it is necessary to collect and analyze a large amount of information. The list of required data includes images, yield data, topographic information.
